Redhat Enterprise Linux 7 ( RHEL7) - Tips

  1. init no longer exists. It has been replaced with systemd. Process looks like
    root         1     0  0 12:03 ?        00:00:01 /usr/lib/systemd/systemd --switched-root --system --deserialize 21
  2. Services are controlled using systemd.service. This means chkconfig service commands are being depreciated
    sudo systemctl start httpd
  3. Doesn't user grub anymore, replaced by grub2
  4. Netcat is replaced with ncat.
  5. iptables is replaced with firewalld
  6. xfs is the preferred filesystem
    1. Supports filesystem sizes up to 500TB, ext4 supports up to 50TB
    2. xfs does not support shrinking filesystem ( even unmounted ) - so we continue to use ext4.
